6191B001.fisheye effect: Now you can get the fisheye effect â a classic photographic distortion â without a fisheye lens.
6191B001.fun and creative modes: Experiment and have fun with a range of creative filters. Use fish-eye effect to re-create fish-eye lens distortion, super vivid to boost color saturation, retro poster and toy camera effects or monochrome. Miniature effect makes scenes in stills or movies look like miniature scale models.
6191B001.hd movies 720p with movie button: Instantly record high quality HD movies (720p) using one touch of the dedicated movie button.
6191B001.help button: Simply press the help button for quick, easy-to-follow guidance on using your camera and its different functions - the ideal introduction for beginners.
6191B001.iframe movie: The AppleÂ® movie format, iFrame, makes it easier and quicker to import and upload videos while retaining high image quality.
6191B001.live view control: Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls.
6191B001.live view control face detection: Live view control allows you to easily experiment with picture settings such as brightness and color intensity and preview the results while framing, so you can capture the best shot. Face detection technology ensures great people shots. It detects up to 35 faces in a single frame making sure they remain in focus and with optimum brightness. Face detection white balance ensures natural skin tones even in unusual lighting conditions. Auto red-eye correction eliminates red-eye.
6191B001.long shutter: Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography.
6191B001.low light: For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly lit situations.
6191B001.miniature effect: Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image.
6191B001.monochrome: Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue.
6191B001.portrait: Brings the subject into focus while beautifully blurring the background.
6191B001.poster effect: Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts.
6191B001.program: The camera automatically and intelligently selects the aperture/shutter speed combination based on the shooting conditions.
6191B001.slim body: The slim, compact body is small enough to take anywhere while the metal exterior adds color and style.
6191B001.smart auto: The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.
6191B001.smart auto 32 scenes: Even complete beginners can effortlessly shoot high quality photos or movies with smart auto, which detects the scene and automatically selects the optimal settings from 32 variables. Press the auto button to return instantly to smart auto from any other mode.
6191B001.snow: Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.
6191B001.super vivid: Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.
6191B001.toy camera effect: Simulates photos taken with a toy or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect.

5157B017.digic 4 image processor: The improved DIGIC 4 Image Processor ensures that images are captured, processed and saved with remarkable speed. The EOS Rebel T3 DSLR's 3:2 multiple aspect ratio, in-camera RAW image processing, creative filters, image resizing and provided S2 and S3 image-recording quality are all possible thanks to the DIGIC 4 Image Processor. With dazzling results, the DIGIC 4 Image Processor also works to capture and process data of images shot at 12.2 Megapixels at 3.0 fps, as well as 14-bit signal processing for excellent image gradation, enhanced Face Detection Live mode, Full HD video recording, Auto Lighting Optimizer and Lens Peripheral Optimization.
5157B017.technology for outstanding images: Canon's CMOS (Complementary Metal Oxide Semiconductor) sensor captures images with exceptional clarity and tonal range, and offers the most pixels in its class. It offers many of the same technologies to maximize each pixel's light gathering efficiency that were first seen with the professional EOS-1D Mark III model. It's an APS-C size sensor (22.2 x 14.8mm), and there's an effective 1.6x increase in the lens's marked focal length when attached.

H0888LL/A.creative shooting modes: Shooting modes include Full Manual, Av and Tv for total creative control, and Low Light, plus Miniature and Fish-eye Effect.
H0888LL/A.digic 4: The DIGIC 4 processor delivers richly detailed, clean images, even when shooting at high ISO speeds. DIGIC 4 also drives exceptional processing speeds, responsive operation, and Servo AF/AE - which tracks moving subjects, keeping them in focus and correctly exposed.
H0888LL/A.effortless shooting: Smart Auto and Easy shooting modes use Scene Detection Technology to determine subject brightness, contrast, distance and hue. H0888LL/A.icontrast: During shooting or playback, i-Contrast optimizes dynamic range and contrast for a scene - retaining detail in shadows and preventing overexposure of highlights.
H0888LL/A.smart shutter: This versatile shooting mode lets you remotely trigger the shot by either winking, smiling, or when an extra face enters the frame.

1285B001.product information:
The Canon PowerShot G7 is a compact 10.0 MP digital camera, with a CCD image sensor and DIGIC III image processor which enables you to capture photographs clearly. With a 6x optical zoom, this Canon camera brings distant objects closer without compromising on sharpness. The optical image stabilizer in the Canon PowerShot G7 lets you shoot blur-free videos despite jerks. Featuring a 2.5-inch LCD display, this Canon camera lets you easily frame shots as well as view the captured photos and videos. This compact digital camera supports various scene modes, letting you be creative with captured images. Moreover, the Red-Eye Reduction function in this digital camera automatically corrects the red-eye effect caused due to flash. With a high ISO sensitivity (up to 1600), this Canon camera captures clear photos even in low-light conditions.

5128B001AA.product information:
Experience an intuitive touch panel technology with the PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera. Do almost everything right on the LCD - like choosing an AF point, set exposure settings and record videos - all with the touch of one finger. The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS brings the art of photography at your command. The Canon HS SYSTEM takes the frustration out of low light shooting. The system delivers clear, blur-free shots with all the ambiance intact, and frees you from the sometimes unwanted effects of using the flash. Beautiful low light shots are possible at both low and high ISO speeds, and the dynamic range is expanded to retain maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas.Experiencing the brilliance of full HD video in a Canon PowerShot ELPH digital camera has never been easier. With the convenient dedicated movie button, you'll be able to instantly record everyday moments in amazing life-like realism at a push of a button. You can also operate the optical zoom while shooting video so you can get in close - but don't worry about shaky footage because Dynamic IS will help keep your videos steady! The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera sports an f/2.0 aperture, perfect for creating enticing portraits, by drawing attention to the face and blurring the background with its impressively shallow depth-of-field. The large aperture also does more. It lets you capture more nuances in low light shooting by using more of the available light. The ultra wide-angle lens puts more into every frame so you can easily photograph landscapes, tall buildings and large groups of people.The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera is equipped with High-Speed Burst mode that lets you catch every single detail in pure Canon brilliance. A 4.4x optical zoom lens enables you to capture subjects that are close and far away. The added bonus of an optical image stabilizer ensures that every moment you photograph will come out amazingly clear and focused. The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera takes the quality of your still images and videos to a high level automatically. The camera's advanced Smart AUTO system detects a wealth of information about the scene you're shooting, then automatically selects the optimal settings for you. Now with an expanded range of 32 shooting scenarios, the camera handles a wide variety of situations, freeing you up to concentrate on composing your shot and capturing the moment you're looking for.For photography enthusiasts, the ability to control aperture and shutter speed is key. The Aperture- and Shutter-priority modes on the Canon PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera make it easy for anyone to take extra control over the look and feel of images captured. In Aperture-priority mode, you set the aperture and the camera automatically selects an appropriate shutter speed. This lets you create sharp subjects with beautifully blurred backgrounds, and landscapes with foreground, middle ground and background all in focus. Shutter-priority mode lets you choose a shutter speed while the camera automatically selects the aperture. Higher shutter speeds are great for catching stop-action shots of moving subjects, while lower shutter.Putting together a video containing highlights from family vacations, important occasions and other special events is now easier than you might imagine. Using the Movie Digest mode, you can have the camera automatically record a short video clip every time you shoot a still image. The camera will then combine an entire day's worth of clips into a single video. No editing required - Movie Digest mode does all the work, so you can sit back and enjoy your video!

5128B001AA.product information:
Experience an intuitive touch panel technology with the PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera. Do almost everything right on the LCD - like choosing an AF point, set exposure settings and record videos - all with the touch of one finger. The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS brings the art of photography at your command. The Canon HS SYSTEM takes the frustration out of low light shooting. The system delivers clear, blur-free shots with all the ambiance intact, and frees you from the sometimes unwanted effects of using the flash. Beautiful low light shots are possible at both low and high ISO speeds, and the dynamic range is expanded to retain maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas.Experiencing the brilliance of full HD video in a Canon PowerShot ELPH digital camera has never been easier. With the convenient dedicated movie button, you'll be able to instantly record everyday moments in amazing life-like realism at a push of a button. You can also operate the optical zoom while shooting video so you can get in close - but don't worry about shaky footage because Dynamic IS will help keep your videos steady! The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera sports an f/2.0 aperture, perfect for creating enticing portraits, by drawing attention to the face and blurring the background with its impressively shallow depth-of-field. The large aperture also does more. It lets you capture more nuances in low light shooting by using more of the available light. The ultra wide-angle lens puts more into every frame so you can easily photograph landscapes, tall buildings and large groups of people.The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera is equipped with High-Speed Burst mode that lets you catch every single detail in pure Canon brilliance. A 4.4x optical zoom lens enables you to capture subjects that are close and far away. The added bonus of an optical image stabilizer ensures that every moment you photograph will come out amazingly clear and focused. The PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera takes the quality of your still images and videos to a high level automatically. The camera's advanced Smart AUTO system detects a wealth of information about the scene you're shooting, then automatically selects the optimal settings for you. Now with an expanded range of 32 shooting scenarios, the camera handles a wide variety of situations, freeing you up to concentrate on composing your shot and capturing the moment you're looking for.For photography enthusiasts, the ability to control aperture and shutter speed is key. The Aperture- and Shutter-priority modes on the Canon PowerShot ELPH 500 HS digital camera make it easy for anyone to take extra control over the look and feel of images captured. In Aperture-priority mode, you set the aperture and the camera automatically selects an appropriate shutter speed. This lets you create sharp subjects with beautifully blurred backgrounds, and landscapes with foreground, middle ground and background all in focus. Shutter-priority mode lets you choose a shutter speed while the camera automatically selects the aperture. Higher shutter speeds are great for catching stop-action shots of moving subjects, while lower shutter.Putting together a video containing highlights from family vacations, important occasions and other special events is now easier than you might imagine. Using the Movie Digest mode, you can have the camera automatically record a short video clip every time you shoot a still image. The camera will then combine an entire day's worth of clips into a single video. No editing required - Movie Digest mode does all the work, so you can sit back and enjoy your video!

3633B011.digic 4 processing: Canon's DIGIC 4 processor drives exceptional processing speeds, responsive operation, and superb image quality and color reproduction. Advanced Noise Reduction ensures richly detailed, clean images, even at high ISO speeds.
3633B011.face detection technology: For perfect portraits, the PowerShot SX20 IS features Canon Face Detection technology. Face Select and Track lets you select a particular face as the main subject, while FaceSelf-Timer makes group photos easy - taking a shot after an extra face enters the frame.
3633B011.hd movies and hdmi output: Shoot HD movies (720p, 30fps) with CD quality stereo sound - ready for sharing on any HDTV via an HDMI connection.
3633B011.icontrast: In shooting or playback, enhanced i-Contrast optimizes dynamic range according to the scene- retaining detail in shadows and preventing overexposure of highlights. The result is natural images with the best possible contrast.
3633B011.smart auto and shooting modes: Smart Auto mode analyzes subject brightness, contrast, distance, hue and movement. Intelligent Scene Detection technology then selects the scene type from 22 variables, applying the best settings for optimum output. 24 dedicated shooting modes include full Manual for complete control.
3633B011.speedlite compatible: For extended shooting options and creative lighting, the PowerShot SX20 IS is compatible with many models in Canon's EX Speedlite flash range.
3633B011.wideangle superzoom: A 20x wide-angle (28mm) optical zoom provides outstanding telephoto reach for stills and movies alike; plus, with Ultrasonic Motor (USM) and Voice Coil Motor (VCM), zooming and focus are fast, accurate and near-silent. Canon's optical IS technology works across the zoom range, to counteract the blur caused by camera shake.

3633B011.121megapixel: A 12.1-megapixel sensor captures the detail you need to make stunning, large-scale prints, or creatively crop images to perfection.
3633B011.25 variangle lcd: A 2.5" vari-angle PureColor VA provides a comfortable way to shoot from almost any position. Quick-Bright and Night Display functions enhance screen visibility in bright or low light.

8406B001.creative filters: This setting provides easy access to special filter effects and scene modes, such as Toy Camera Effect, Poster Effect, Monochrome and more.
8406B001.custom: Define and store your own settings to achieve the effects you prefer.
8406B001.fireworks: Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks.
8406B001.fisheye effect: Add a classic photo distortion without a fisheye lens.
8406B001.handheld night scene: Take clear and steady pictures at night without the use of a tripod.
8406B001.high dynamic range: The camera combines three different exposures to get one evenly lit image.
8406B001.manual: You have complete control of exposure, selecting both aperture and shutter speed manually.
8406B001.miniature effect: Emphasizes perspectives for a miniature effect by blurring upper and bottom portions of the image.
8406B001.monochrome: Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue.
8406B001.movie: Record video in stereo sound. Unwanted scenes can be deleted in playback mode.
8406B001.nostalgic: Create the look and feel of old photographs using sepia tones and black-and-white.
8406B001.portrait: The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject “pop.”
8406B001.poster effect: Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts.
8406B001.program: Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically.
8406B001.shutterpriority: You select the shutter speed to stop or blur action, and the camera finds the appropriate aperture. With slow exposure times, Canon's noise reduction system activates to ensure low image noise.
8406B001.smart auto: The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.
8406B001.smart shutter: The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame.
8406B001.snow: Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.
8406B001.super vivid: Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.
8406B001.toy camera effect: Simulates photos taken with “toy” or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect.
8406B001.underwater: Capture underwater images with reduced backscatter effect. Optional Underwater Case required.

8120A013.product information:
The PowerShot G3 delivers outstanding image quality and flexibility in every shooting situation. It features a new, ultra fast f/2.0 aperture 4.x optical zoom lens, along with a 4 Mega Pixel primary color CCD and Canon's unique high-performance DIGIC processor.The PowerShot G3 is equipped with a compact and fast 4x optical zoom lens with a focal length of 7.2 to 28.8mm (35-140mm equivalent in 35mm format) and a fast maximum aperture range of f2.0 (W) to f3.0 (T). Made up of 8 elements in 7 groups, the lens focusing is controlled from the rear by moving just one element. This means that focusing is fast and consumes very little power.RAW mode allows you to obtain original image data, recording the image direct from the CCD without any image processing. With RAW mode images, you can alter and set the parameters of image before being saved or transferred to the PC. A loss-less (reversible) compression method for RAW image capture is used (as opposed to the non-reversible compression formats of JPEG), allowing all the original data to be retrieved from the CompactFlash card. It also has the advantage of requiring approximately 40% less space than a totally uncompressed image, with no loss in quality.3 Exposure Modes include Center weighted average, Evaluative and Spot. Center weighted average measures light from the entire image but weights the metering in favor of the center portion. With the Evaluative mode, the image is divided into a number of blocks and the image is evaluated to determine the subject, brightness, if it is front/back lit and selects the appropriate exposure. Using the Spot mode light is measured from a specific point of the image. The spot metering point can be either fixed to the center or linked to the currently selected focusing point.There is no 'step' drop in resolution as the camera enters the digital zoom function. The optical zoom is used as far as possible, to the limit of the telephoto end (105mm in 35mm format), at which point the digital zoom function will operate, gradually reducing the CCD reading area until it reaches the final center portion.12 EOS-based picture-taking modes include two NEW custom modes, manual, Av, TV, Program, Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Night Scene, Stitch Assist and Movie mode.Since the aperture and shutter mechanisms are now separate devices, the PowerShot G3 can use a greater variety of aperture/shutter combinations than the PowerShot G2, allowing for greater photographic flexibility. The PowerShot G3 can now achieve a shutter speed of 1/1250th sec at max aperture f2.0 - f3.0 (compared to 1/500th sec from the G2). Conversely, to achieve a shutter speed of 1/2000th sec, the maximum aperture is f4.0 - f5.6.Continuous Shooting Modes include High Speed and Normal. Choosing the 'speed priority' mode will allow the camera to shoot a number of shots at a very fast rate, however, this very fast burst rate can only be sustained for a small number of shots. (Approx. 1.5 images/sec for a maximum of 14 images at this speed). Choosing the 'quantity priority' mode will allow the camera to shoot a larger number of shots than in the 'speed priority mode' in quick succession, but is slower. This mode shoots at a similar rate to the PowerShot G1 in continuous shooting mode. (Approx. 2.5 images/sec for a maximum of 14 images at this speed)Interval Shooting are selectable from the menu system (P, Tv, Av, M, C modes). Multiple of 1-minute intervals for up to 60 minutes; maximum of 100 shots (depending on capacity of CF card).The PowerShot G3 allows the user to select the camera's ND filter. When selected, an ND8 (or 0.9) filter is placed over the sensor, internally within the camera, reducing the amount of light reaching the sensor without affecting the color balance. This is especially useful in very bright conditions where a slow shutter speed/large aperture is required or when using a flash in very close, macro photography.A tiny sensor has been incorporated into ...

A loss-less (reversible) compression method for RAW image capture is used (as opposed to the non-reversible compression formats of JPEG), allowing all the original data to be retrieved from the CompactFlash card. It also has the advantage of requiring approximately 40% less space than a totally uncompressed image, with no loss in quality.3 Exposure Modes include Center weighted average, Evaluative and Spot. Center weighted average measures light from the entire image but weights the metering in favor of the center portion. With the Evaluative mode, the image is divided into a number of blocks and the image is evaluated to determine the subject, brightness, if it is front/back lit and selects the appropriate exposure. Using the Spot mode light is measured from a specific point of the image. The spot metering point can be either fixed to the center or linked to the currently selected focusing point.There is no 'step' drop in resolution as the camera enters the digital zoom function. The optical zoom is used as far as possible, to the limit of the telephoto end (105mm in 35mm format), at which point the digital zoom function will operate, gradually reducing the CCD reading area until it reaches the final center portion.12 EOS-based picture-taking modes include two NEW custom modes, manual, Av, TV, Program, Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Night Scene, Stitch Assist and Movie mode.Since the aperture and shutter mechanisms are now separate devices, the PowerShot G3 can use a greater variety of aperture/shutter combinations than the PowerShot G2, allowing for greater photographic flexibility. The PowerShot G3 can now achieve a shutter speed of 1/1250th sec at max aperture f2.0 - f3.0 (compared to 1/500th sec from the G2). Conversely, to achieve a shutter speed of 1/2000th sec, the maximum aperture is f4.0 - f5.6.Continuous Shooting Modes include High Speed and Normal. Choosing the 'speed priority' mode will allow the camera to shoot a number of shots at a very fast rate, however, this very fast burst rate can only be sustained for a small number of shots. (Approx. 1.5 images/sec for a maximum of 14 images at this speed). Choosing the 'quantity priority' mode will allow the camera to shoot a larger number of shots than in the 'speed priority mode' in quick succession, but is slower. This mode shoots at a similar rate to the PowerShot G1 in continuous shooting mode. (Approx. 2.5 images/sec for a maximum of 14 images at this speed)Interval Shooting are selectable from the menu system (P, Tv, Av, M, C modes). Multiple of 1-minute intervals for up to 60 minutes; maximum of 100 shots (depending on capacity of CF card).The PowerShot G3 allows the user to select the camera's ND filter. When selected, an ND8 (or 0.9) filter is placed over the sensor, internally within the camera, reducing the amount of light reaching the sensor without affecting the color balance. This is especially useful in very bright conditions where a slow shutter speed/large aperture is required or when using a flash in very close, macro photography.A tiny sensor has been incorporated into ...

4463B019.full hd movie recording:
The EOS 550D combines exceptional still shooting with the ability to
shoot Full HD (1080p) video. To satisfy your creativity the EOS 550D
features full manual control and selectable frame rates. You can also
shoot high speed 50/60fps movies at 720P for when the action is really
fast. An HDMI connection allows High Definition playback of footage
and images on any HDTV . Also with compatible TVs
playback can be controlled using the TV's remote control.

- expandable to 12800 for those environments where using flash is
undesirable.

A 63-zone dual layer metering sensor analyzes focus, color and
luminance information, providing accurate and consistent metering.
4463B019.movie crop:
Shoot VGA movies with an effective zoom of 7x. Movie crop uses only
the center part of the sensor and allows long distance shooting
without having to change lenses.
4463B019.quick control screen:
Accessible using a dedicated button it provides easy access to
commonly used functions, ensuring that you are ready to take the shot
as it happens.

An HDMI connection allows High Definition playback of footage and images on any HDTV. Also with compatible TVs playback can be controlled using the TV's remote control.
4463B035.high iso for low light: When light levels fall, the EOS 550D offers an ISO range of up to 6400 - expandable to 12800 for those environments where using flash is undesirable.
4463B035.ifcl metering system: A 63-zone dual layer metering sensor analyzes focus, color and luminance information, providing accurate and consistent metering.
4463B035.movie crop: Shoot VGA movies with an effective zoom of 7x. Movie crop uses only the center part of the sensor and allows long distance shooting without having to change lenses.
4463B035.quick control screen: Accessible using a dedicated button it provides easy access to commonly used functions, ensuring that you are ready to take the shot as it happens.

A2200RED.charge up and go: The Canon PowerShot A2200 digital camera uses a lithium-ion battery. This compact, powerful battery helps make it a lightweight and slim camera. Charge-up is quick and easy, so the PowerShot A2200 will be ready and waiting for those special moments.
A2200RED.everythings easy: Just set the Canon PowerShot A2200 digital camera to smart auto and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture-taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 32 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images.
A2200RED.loaded with features packed with value: With the PowerShot A2200, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 14.1 mega pixel camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends you'll be proud to display. The PowerShot A2200 has a 4x wide optical zoom lens that let you capture up-close and memorable images.
A2200RED.see the image on a big screen: The PowerShot A2200 digital camera has a large 2.7-inch LCD screen that gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high resolution screen offers a crisp, clear and bright picture. It also features night display for easy viewing in low light.
A2200RED.shoot without distractions: How many times have you found yourself in a situation where you wanted to take a picture, but were reluctant to disrupt the setting with noise or flash? Discreet mode makes picture-taking possible in museums, at performances, anywhere light and sound would not be welcome. Simply turn the mode dial to discreet, and the camera's sound, flash and AF assist beam will be disabled - without changing any other settings. If the camera senses low light, ISO speed will be automatically raised to get the best possible shot. You can even switch to playback mode to review still images or video, and the camera will remain muted.

A2200BLK.everythings easy: Just set the Canon PowerShot A2200 digital camera to smart auto and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture-taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 32 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images.
A2200BLK.loaded with features packed with value: With the PowerShot A2200, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 14.1 mega pixel camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends you'll be proud to display. The PowerShot A2200 has a 4x wide optical zoom lens that let you capture up-close and memorable images.
A2200BLK.see the image on a big screen: The PowerShot A2200 digital camera has a large 2.7-inch LCD screen that gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high resolution screen offers a crisp, clear and bright picture. It also features night display for easy viewing in low light.
A2200BLK.shoot without distractions: How many times have you found yourself in a situation where you wanted to take a picture, but were reluctant to disrupt the setting with noise or flash? Discreet mode makes picture-taking possible in museums, at performances, anywhere light and sound would not be welcome. Simply turn the mode dial to discreet, and the camera's sound, flash and AF assist beam will be disabled - without changing any other settings. If the camera senses low light, ISO speed will be automatically raised to get the best possible shot. You can even switch to playback mode to review still images or video, and the camera will remain muted.

0321B001.product information:
You've never seen anything quite like the PowerShot A620. Loaded with features, this high-performance camera has a 7.1 Megapixel CCD to give you magnificent pictures at a price that will amaze you. And it's easy to use. Everything about this superb camera has been designed for your picture-taking pleasure. And that makes it fun!The PowerShot A620 has 7.1 Megapixels that let you shoot with amazing precision. The crisp detail and brilliant true-to-life color is simply amazing. But it's only the beginning, because these high-quality images have the resolution you need to create the larger prints you've always wanted. Plus, the longer, retractable 4x Optical Zoom lens lets you get in close to intimately capture life's small, magical moments.The PowerShot A620 has a big 2.0-inch LCD screen with an astonishing 115,000 pixels of resolution. So whether you're setting up your shot or playing it back, everything is bright and clear. The vari-angle design lets you swivel the LCD screen 180Â° to the front of the camera and display either a mirror image or a non-reversed image so you can shoot from just about any position.The PowerShot A620's cleanly integrated grip gives you a comfortable, steady hold. And you can count on exact focus no matter where your subject is in the frame. Plus, you've also got Special Scene Mode that gives you breathtaking, exhilarating pictures even when shooting conditions are tough.The PowerShot A620 is powered by Canon's DIGIC II Image Processor. Designed to improve processing speed and image quality, DIGIC II provides markedly faster camera startup, autofocus and playback, plus it assures that every image is more colorfully vibrant.Now A620 enables you to record QVGA (320 x 240), 60 fps movies up to 1 minute. PowerShot A620 also supports the USB 2.0 Hi-Speed standard, so you'll enjoy the highest possible data transfer speeds when using a USB 2.0 compatible computer. The camera's performance level is high enough to take full advantage of super-high-speed SD memory cards as well.The PowerShot A620's Print/Share button makes direct printing easier than ever. Simply connect the A620 to any PictBridge compatible photo printer, press the lighted Print/Share button and print! Also use the Print/Share button to transfer images directly to a computer.

So whether you're setting up your shot or playing it back, everything is bright and clear. The vari-angle design lets you swivel the LCD screen 180Â° to the front of the camera and display either a mirror image or a non-reversed image so you can shoot from just about any position.The PowerShot A620's cleanly integrated grip gives you a comfortable, steady hold. And you can count on exact focus no matter where your subject is in the frame. Plus, you've also got Special Scene Mode that gives you breathtaking, exhilarating pictures even when shooting conditions are tough.The PowerShot A620 is powered by Canon's DIGIC II Image Processor. Designed to improve processing speed and image quality, DIGIC II provides markedly faster camera startup, autofocus and playback, plus it assures that every image is more colorfully vibrant.Now A620 enables you to record QVGA (320 x 240), 60 fps movies up to 1 minute. PowerShot A620 also supports the USB 2.0 Hi-Speed standard, so you'll enjoy the highest possible data transfer speeds when using a USB 2.0 compatible computer. The camera's performance level is high enough to take full advantage of super-high-speed SD memory cards as well.The PowerShot A620's Print/Share button makes direct printing easier than ever. Simply connect the A620 to any PictBridge compatible photo printer, press the lighted Print/Share button and print! Also use the Print/Share button to transfer images directly to a computer.

6864A001AA.product information:
You say you want first-class definition, sharpness and color? Well, you've got them with this pixel-packed PowerShot A20. To make sure your transition to the world of digital photography is a clear one, PowerShot A20 delivers enough definition to satisfy the most discerning eye. The A20's 2.1-megapixel CCD is augmented by a primary color filter and adaptive signal processing. It means that this camera will capture every detail of all your adventures with a clarity and brilliance that will amaze you. PowerShot A20 features a high-resolution 3x optical zoom that allows you to get in on the action without being right on top of it. And a digital zoom feature gets you even closer! Far out shots are within your reach! PowerShot A20's fully automatic optical zoom lens allows you to frame the perfect shot - from portrait to landscape - with the touch of a button. And if that isn't enough, A20's 2.5x digital zoom will bring you closer still.Still having fun after sundown? Not to worry! A20 packs a powerful flash that will shed light on your darkest hour. From focus to flash, A20 is fully automated - so you'll never miss out on the perfect shot while you're fumbling with your settings. Relying on easy-to-find AA batteries, A20 is also incredibly energy-efficient, so you'll never run out of juice while shooting your vacation. And for economy-minded users, the optional rechargeable NiMH batteries guarantee the power you need at a savings you will appreciate. A20 is incredibly affordable, but you'd never guess it based on several features they have in common with higher-end cameras. 5251B005.35x wideangle optical zoom and 24mm lens: The PowerShot SX40 HS is equipped with a Genuine Canon 35x Zoom lens that provides the telephoto power to bring your distant subjects incredibly close. It also features a useful zoom range that begins at 24mm wide-angle and extends to 840mm telephoto (35mm equivalent). The 24mm ultra Wide-Angle allows you to create shots with dramatic perspective and makes it easy to shoot sweeping landscapes, large groups of people and tall buildings. This superb lens delivers outstanding optical performance throughout its zoom range. It's advanced design employs UD glass, double-sided aspherical glass-molded and ultra-high-refraction-index glass lens elements to effectively suppress chromatic aberration while maintaining a remarkably compact size. The camera uses a VCM (Voice Coil Motor) for high-speed, quiet, energy-efficient lens movement with precise control.

5251B005.optical image stabilizer: Handheld shooting can often lead to camera shake, making photos and videos blurry. Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer is a sophisticated system that uses lens-shift technology to correct for unwanted camera movement. It makes handheld photography more practical, providing excellent image quality in many difficult shooting situations: outdoors at dusk, inside without a flash, and even at the telephoto end of the zoom range without a tripod. For photos, it enables shooting at slower shutter speeds, accommodating more low-light shooting situations than ever before without having to boost ISO sensitivity. With camera shake and vibration reduced, you get a sharper, steadier image. And because it is an optical system, there is none of the image degradation typical with electronic image stabilizers.

5161B030AA.digic 4 image processor: The improved DIGIC 4 Image Processor ensures that images are captured, processed and saved with remarkable speed. It's an APS-C size sensor (22.2 x 14.8mm), and there's an effective 1.6x increase in the lens's marked focal length when attached.
